title: Shyam Mohan Pal
content: Shyam Mohan Pal Creative Sr. Web Designer & Fronted Developer My name is Shyam Mohan Pal. I am a Sr. Web Designer & Fronted Developer, and I'm very passionate and dedicated to my work. With 7 years experience as a professional a Sr. Web Designer & Fronted Developer, I have acquired the skills and knowledge.
